descriptor.name: Kiwi Jam
descriptor.short_desc: There are no chemical preservatives, no artificial colours or flavours are added in the Jam.
descriptor.long_desc: We make very low-sugar, tasty, healthy and fresh fruit spreads, so that you experience the natural flavour of fruit. Our jams are 80% fruit by weight, so in every spoonful you also consume a healthy portion of condensed fruit.
